text: Ebantwini kukho abo bathi: “Siyakholwa kuAllâh,” kodwa athi omnye kubo esakuhlelwa bububi ngenxa ka- Allâh, bayithathe loo ntlungu yenziwe ngabantu (kubo) ngokungengathi sisohlwayo sika-Allâh. Kodwa xa uloyiso lufika luvela eNkosini yakho, bathi: “Inene thina besikunye nani.”Ayingo-Allâh na Ongoyena Waziyo ngoko kusezifubeni zezidalwa
